title: Indonesia President Invitational
text: The Indonesia President Invitational was an <a href="Asian%20Tour">Asian Tour</a> <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament. It was played for the first time in October 2007 at the Bumi Serpong Damai Course in <a href="Indonesia">Indonesia</a>. The Bumi Serpong Damai Course was designed by <a href="Jack%20Nicklaus">Jack Nicklaus</a>. The tournament's main sponsor was <a href="Pertamina">Pertamina</a> in 2007 and 2008. In 2009, the purse was US$400,000.
